original_text: To many thou shalt give the more inheritance, and to few thou shalt give the less inheritance: to every one shall his inheritance be given according to those that were numbered of him.
korean_text: 수가 많은 자에게는 기업을 많이 줄 것이요 수가 적은 자에게는 기업을 적게 줄 것이니 그들이 계수된 수대로 각기 기업을 주되

sentences.original_text: To many thou shalt give the more inheritance
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람에게는 더 많은 유산을 주어야 할지니

sentences.original_text: and to few thou shalt give the less inheritance
sentences.korean_translation: 적은 사람에게는 더 적은 유산을 주어야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: to every one shall his inheritance be given
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람에게 그의 유산이 주어질 것이니

sentences.original_text: according to those that were numbered of him
